job_title: Online Faculty Manager in Talladega, AL
pros: The staff, faculty and students at the college are awesome. Staff and faculty are the best. Great to work with and so positive. And I enjoy working with our students, it means so much to give back to this generation of bright undergrads and postgrads.
cons: Communication can always be better at any business. And we are lacking in this department.

review_title: Great place for opportunities gor young faculty who want to be trailblazers in their field
pros: School is evolving so it is a good place for you g faculty who wish to aspire high without the restrictions of old set in your ways administration
cons: Some things that are really needed to secure young faculty ling term are not in place but ARE in the plans for near future. New admin (Billy C nor Dr. Long are still the helm) is having to right a lot of things to bring the school into this century!

pros: The salary was good for the position I held. Eligibility for remitted tuition with the College effective after 3 months of employment. The campus is growing and staff was included in the process.
cons: They do not have direct deposit for payroll employees. Also, the turnover rate is high for the institution as a whole. Human resource practices moralistically questionable and not standard for today's work environment.

job_title: POLICE CHIEF/DIRECTOR of PUBLIC SAFETY in Talladega, AL

pros: Small institution, positive interaction with students
cons: Lack of leadership, non progressive leadership

job_title: Registered Nurse Assistant in Stockbridge, GA
pros:
great place to work •	Performs clinical lab procedures following established guidelines.
•	Tabulates, statistically analyzes and summarizes data using personal computers and software packages.
•	Scheduled appointments for student body, took vital signs, organized campus wide health fair, and assisted the Registered Nurse and the Clinical Advisor in performing their duties and functions, in accordance with established policies and procedures. 
•	Maintains inventory of chemicals, prepares solutions and reagents for use in the laboratory, field, or greenhouse, and safely disposes of waste material (both chemical and biological).
cons:
•	Maintained confidentiality of hospital information and working relationships with associates in other departments
•	Collects, prepares, evaluates and verifies samples and supporting records. Provides input into the initial planning of experiments.

pros:
